results.title: Stripping Confederate Ties, the U.S. Navy Renames Two Vessels
results.abstract: The vessels will be named for Robert Smalls, a mariner who commandeered a Confederate ship to freedom from slavery, and Marie Tharp, an ocean geologist who studied continental drift.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces

media.caption: The U.S.S. Chancellorsville, a guided-missile cruiser, in the Philippine Sea in 2016. It will be renamed the U.S.S. Robert Smalls, after a formerly enslaved mariner who steered a Confederate ship to freedom.
